attributes.title: hate life
attributes.review: chile when i tell you this app is bad IT IS BAD. doesn’t give out any good information and when i tried buying merch which the UNITED STATES FLAG SHOULD NEVER BE ON CLOTHES OR USED AS MERCH LIKE TRUMP DOES but when i tried buying a man eating a human came up on screen😓😓😓😓 i think it was donald trump with his friends on that sex trafficking island!!!!⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: 1 star
attributes.review: terrible app it told me to delete all my other apps in order to download it and made me change my background on my home and lock screen to a picture of President Donald Trump ❤️. Do not recommend this app unless you want to get hacked. sent with love ❤️

attributes.title: r-r-r-roll💿up⬆️to2️⃣the🤩party🥳with🧶
attributes.review: i saw this app and i wanted to see what our racist and rapist of a president was up too. once i opened this horrendous app i was electrocuted and DIED right off the bat😤 then my phone exploded and the cheeto himself came and burnt down my house🤧 i couldn’t even save my poor dogs from his terrorist actions. MORAL OF THE STORY IS STAN CHARLI FOR CLEAR SKIN🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: 🧚🏽‍♀️ Worst app 🧚🏽‍♀️
attributes.review: I hated this app I had a bad experience and when I opened it my phone cracked because I threw it because I saw an Oompa Loompa lookin bug in there, Cheeto dust was flying over the screen and then I fell out of my car and got my arm broken and I ended up in the hospital, worst app I’ve ever had.✨✨✨🧍🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Useless
attributes.review: I wanted this app solely to see what Trumps plans were for his campaign. But it won’t even let me stay on the app longer than 5 minutes without force shutting. How can we expect a man who can’t even get an app right to fix our country?

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: So I open the thing and the first thing I see is Trump's face. It's a bit of an instant turn off. I think it should be just his name or something. Plus you need to put your phone number in to access the app, and that feels inappropriate.

attributes.title: I almost died 😔
attributes.review: I downloaded this app last night and was getting ready to go to bed when, out of the corner of my eye, i see a big orange man standing in the corner of my room with a brick 😦. i immediately deleted the app and he disappeared, you have been warned.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: As a Trump supporter, I am highly disappointed with this app. I certainly had very high expectations, however this app is just un usable. Every time I open it, it crashes and kicks me out of the app. I will be deleting this app off of my phone.

attributes.title: Make this app great again(actually don’t)
attributes.review: I’m not saying I hate this app, I love this app. I’m just saying this app it could be...it could be better. And uh-I think we and by we I mean me can make it better and I know just how to do that. I won’t tell you how to do that but I can.

attributes.title: this is horrendous.           ❤️tik tok❤️
attributes.review: I was on the app and then all of a sudden, I went back to my home page and my other apps were getting deleted. Then I had re download them and set them all back up. It was awful. This is the worse app ever!!!!!!!!!!!
